```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
df <- fread("C:/Users/lexokan/Desktop/Yelp/sample4.csv") %>% 
    select(-V1)
```

```{r}
temp <- df %>% 
    filter(city == "Las Vegas", str_detect(categories, "Restaurants")) %>% 
    select(-c(city, text, categories, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday))

temp$date <- as.Date(temp$date, format = '%Y-%m-%d')
temp$yelping_since <- as.Date(temp$yelping_since, format = '%Y-%m-%d')
temp <- na.omit(temp)

pca <- prcomp(temp)


for(col in colnames(temp)) {
    print(mean(temp[col]))
}

```
